sections.heading: Request; allowance in part; issuance of warrant
sections.text: When a request has been in part allowed by the Department of Administrative Services, a warrant shall be drawn as in other cases in which the whole request is allowed.SourceLaws 1877, ยง 5, p. 203;R.S.1913, ยง 6684;C.S.1922, ยง 6221;C.S.1929, ยง 77-2610;R.
